sentences.en: Find Bernie and get him to knock an agreement together.
sentences.cn: 找到伯尼，让他尽快拟好一份协议。

sentences.en: Four of them had gone off to find help.
sentences.cn: 他们中的4个人去寻求帮助了。

sentences.en: He awoke to find Charlie standing near the bed.
sentences.cn: 他醒了过来，发现查利正站在床边。

sentences.en: he hadn't time to find out what was bothering her.
sentences.cn: 他无暇搞清是什么在困扰她。

sentences.en: He kept encouraging Rosie to find a place of her own.
sentences.cn: 他不断鼓励罗茜为自己找个住处。

sentences.en: He made it his object in life to find the island.
sentences.cn: 他把找到那座岛屿当成自己的人生目标。

sentences.en: He returned to the airport to find his car alarm going off.
sentences.cn: 他回到机场时听到自己的汽车报警器响了。

sentences.en: Her body was later found hidden in the bushes.
sentences.cn: 后来有人发现她的尸体被藏在了灌木丛里。

sentences.en: Her mother went to the shops, and on her return, Kathleen was nowhere to be found (= could not be found ) .
sentences.cn: 妈妈去买东西，回来的时候凯思琳找不到了。

sentences.en: Hold on while I find a pen.
sentences.cn: 别挂电话，我找支笔。

sentences.en: I can’t find the car keys.
sentences.cn: 我找不到汽车钥匙。

sentences.en: I find no pleasure in seeing people make asses of themselves.
sentences.cn: 我看见人们出洋相并不幸灾乐祸。

sentences.en: I found out the phone number by looking it up. If you're not sure, find out.
sentences.cn: 通过查找我查到了电话号码。如果你不肯定，查一查

sentences.en: I have $100m hidden away where no one will ever find it.
sentences.cn: 我把1亿美元藏到了一个永远没人会找到的地方。

sentences.en: I have to find somewhere else to live.
sentences.cn: 我得另找住处。

sentences.en: I managed to find a solution to the problem.
sentences.cn: 我设法找出了解决问题的办法。

sentences.en: I will return, find you, love you, marry you and live without shame.
sentences.cn: 我会回去，找到你，爱你，娶你，活的光明正大。《赎罪》

sentences.en: In working with others, you find out more about yourself.
sentences.cn: 在与别人一起工作的过程中，你会进一步认识你自己。

sentences.en: It would be difficult to find two men who were more dissimilar.
sentences.cn: 很难找到彼此间差异更大的人了。

sentences.en: Liars risk being found out.
sentences.cn: 骗子被揭穿的危险

sentences.en: Many parents find it hard to discourage bad behaviour.
sentences.cn: 很多父母觉得要孩子循规蹈矩是件很难的事情。

sentences.en: Most embezzlers are found out in the end.
sentences.cn: 大多数贪污犯最后都被查出并逮捕归案

sentences.en: Seb could not find it in his heart to dislike Plunkett.
sentences.cn: 塞布不忍心讨厌普朗凯特。

sentences.en: She had almost given up hope of finding a husband.
sentences.cn: 她差不多要放弃找个丈夫的希望了。

sentences.en: She woke up and found herself in a hospital bed.
sentences.cn: 她醒来发觉自己躺在医院的床上。

sentences.en: she would always find him out if he tried to lie.
sentences.cn: 要是他想撒谎，她总能察觉。

sentences.en: the ballets did not &B{find favour with} the public.
sentences.cn: 芭蕾舞剧不受大众喜爱。

sentences.en: the Court of Exchequer found for the plaintiffs.
sentences.cn: 税务署判原告无罪。

sentences.en: There are many people who still find the act of abortion abhorrent.
sentences.cn: 仍有很多人对堕胎行为表示厌恶。

sentences.en: They find it difficult to pump themselves up for the games.
sentences.cn: 他们感到要为自己加油打气，自信满满地去打比赛并不容易。

sentences.en: We guarantee that you will find a community with which to socialise.
sentences.cn: 我们保证你们会找到自己的交际圈。

sentences.en: your wages would be five shillings all found.
sentences.cn: 你们的工资是五先令，食宿免费。

sentences.en: your wages would be five shillings all found.
sentences.cn: 你们的工资是五先令，食宿免费。

words.tran_cn: 发现者；探测器；（照相机的）[摄] 取景器；（大望远镜上的）[天] 寻星镜

phrases.tran_cn: 受喜爱，获得欢心；被接受

phrases.phrase: find for (或 find in favour of)
find it in one's heart to do something
phrases.tran_cn: 允许（或强迫）自己做，忍心做…
找到解决办法；渗入到；推开人群挤过去（等于push one's way）
自我感觉；发现自己处于某种状态；发现自己的能力
找出；弄清有关…的情况；调查关于
发觉，察觉，看出，看穿（某人的不道德或无礼行为）

phrases.phrase: find something out (或 find out about something)

phrases.tran_cn: 结果却发现（表达出人意料或不愉快的意思）

trans.tran_en: something very good or useful that you discover by chance
to discover, see, or get something that you have been searching for

trans.tran_cn: 发现，找到，遇见，认识到，认为，现有（可用），发觉，达到，存在，裁决
trans.tran_en: to discover, see, or get something that you have been searching for

trans.tran_cn: 找到， 发现； 感到
trans.tran_en: to discover, see, or get something that you have been searching for
